name: Pinyin
tagline: A simple python script to translate chinese to pinyin based on Mandarin.dat
body:
Pinyin
======

Translate chinese chars to pinyin based on Mandarin.dat

Install
-------

```bash
$ pip install pinyin
```

Usage
-----

```python
>>> import pinyin
>>> pinyin.get(u'你好')
'nihao'
>>> pinyin.get_initial(u'你好')
'n h'
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
